name: INResumeWorkoutIntentHandling
desc: The interface that handles requests to resume a workout.

items.name: func resolveWorkoutName(for: INResumeWorkoutIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the workout name that the user wants to resume.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INResumeWorkoutIntent, completion: (INResumeWorkoutIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that your app is able to resume the workout.
